text: “Ia Judan Arazibagh fozir gumaziba ko Farisiba, Iavzika! Ia bar ikuvigham! Ia ifavaribagh amir gumaziba! Ia ongariba ko nguazir igharaziba bar dar ghua, suren gumazir vamɨra iniasa ruiagha arui. Eghtɨ ia gumazitam batogh Judan Arazibar a geghantɨ, a ian nɨghnɨzibar gɨn mangɨ, egh a bar ian mɨrara uaghan helɨn mangam. Ia a damightɨ, a bar ia gafiragh arazir kurabar amuam.
